content.rendered: MATA ROOP RANI organ HOSPITAL is a 93 bedded multispecialty hospital which is registered with the Directorate of Health services, Govt of NCT, delhi. If you are looking to work with a truly global organization, MATA ROOP RANI organ HOSPITAL is where you should be. With a culturally diverse and a truly international team, we can provide a solid foundation for building a fulfilling professional career.
